title: Little hit, big win; Royals beat Jays for 2-0 lead in ALCS
text: BING NEWS: Little hit, big win; Royals beat Jays for 2-0 lead in ALCS KANSAS CITY, Mo. â€” The Kansas City Royals kept waiting for Blue Jays ace David Price to give them some hope. It turned out to be Toronto's leaky defense that provided it.
